com.bigdata.rdf.lexicon

Interface ISubjectCentricTextIndexer<A extends IHit>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ITextIndexer<A>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigdataSubjectCentricFullTextIndex

    public interface ISubjectCentricTextIndexer<A extends IHit>
extends ITextIndexer<A>
    Abstraction for the text indexer for RDF Values allowing either the built-in bigdata FullTextIndex or support for Lucene, etc.
    Version:
    $Id: ITextIndexer.java 4585 2011-06-01 13:42:56Z thompsonbry $
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    AbstractTripleStore.Options#TEXT_INDEXER_CLASS

    • Method Detail

      • index

        void index(IV<?,?> subject,
         Iterator<BigdataValue> valuesIterator)

        Add the terms to the full text index so that we can do fast lookup of the corresponding term identifiers. Only literals are tokenized. Literals that have a language code property are parsed using a tokenizer appropriate for the specified language family. Other literals and URIs are tokenized using the default Locale.

        In the subject-centric text index, these tokenized literals are rolled up by subject rather than using the IV for the literals as the docId in the text index.
        Parameters:
        subject - The subject to which these values belong.
        itr - Iterator visiting the terms to be indexed.
